name: Super Donkey Kong 99
overview: Super Donkey Kong 99, sometimes known as Super King Kong 99, is an unlicensed Sega Mega Drive game possibly created by Gamtec. It is an attempt to bring the likes of SNES game, Donkey Kong Country (Super Donkey Kong in Japan) to Sega's system, though it is very different to any of the SNES games. Players control Donkey Kong through a variety of levels whose graphics are taken from Donkey Kong Country and Donkey Kong Country 3: Dixie Kong's Double Trouble!. There are also several enemies taken from Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest. A boss will appear every couple of levels. The final boss is unbeatable without using a cheat.
